query_summary: The program likely fails to correctly handle the scenario where multiple routes have the same number of flights but different total souvenir values, leading to incorrect results when determining the optimal path.
oracle_summary: On ties in path length during the Floydâ€“Warshall relaxation, the buggy code picks the minimum accumulated value (using min) instead of the required maximum (using max).
